Title: A shining example - A great beginning - Chairman Mao's 8th inspection of the Cultural Revolution army
Publisher: China Film Distribution and Exhibition Company (中国电影发行放映公司发行)
Notes: Mao 'inspected' the Red Guards on Tian'anmen Square for the eighth time on 11 November 1966.Announcement for a documentary film by the Central News and Documentary Studio (中央新闻纪录电影制片厂), co-produced by the August First Film Studio (八一电影制片厂).
